text:
@realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC You have no empathy or compassion.
You don't care how many people die or have lifelong health problems from COVID19 (COronaVIrusDisease2019).
You'll have your ego stroking bs filled rallies, no matter how dangerous they are.
PUT ON A MASK, YOU MONSTER.
#SwampyDon
#TraitorTrump
